original_text: The boar out of the wood doth waste it, and the wild beast of the field doth devour it.
korean_text: 숲 속의 멧돼지들이 상해하며 들짐승들이 먹나이다

sentences.original_text: The boar out of the wood doth waste it
sentences.korean_translation: 숲에서 나온 멧돼지가 그것을 황폐하게 하고

sentences.original_text: and the wild beast of the field doth devour it
